changelog.release_notes: Major update with improved bone importing and changelog system
new_features: Added changelog system with detailed release notes
Added 'What's New' popup dialog in Blender
Added multiple store support for updates
Added direct changelog viewing from Blender
changes: Improved bone import to properly override transforms
Better error handling for network requests
fixes: Fixed bone transforms not being applied during import
Fixed parent relationship issues in armature import
Fixed update checker not working on some systems
Fixed UI freezing during update checks

new_features: Export and import vertex group weights
Export and import armature bones with properties
changes: Enhanced error reporting and user feedback
